doctor.name: Dr. Md. Khalilur Rahman
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Khalilur Rahman is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS (RMC), DTCD (DMC), Trained (Thailand, Tanzania). He is working as a Chest & TB Diseases Specialist doctor in Chest Disease Clinic & Hospital, Pabna. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sunrise Diagnostic Center, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Khalilur Rahman at Sunrise Diagnostic Center, Pabna is 9am to 1pm & 5pm to 8pm (Everyday).

chamber.address: In front pf TB Hospital, Hospital Road, Shalgaria, Pabna

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Moklesur Rahman
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases, Asthma & Respiratory Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Moklesur Rahman is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DTCD (NIDCH). He is a Jr. Consultant (Respiratory Medicine) at Chest Disease Clinic & Hospital, Pabna. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Moklesur Rahman at Labaid Diagnostic, Pabna is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Beside Joy Kali Bari, Thana Road, Shalgaria, Pabna

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Sanwar Nawaz Khan
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases (Asthma, Cough, COPD) & Respiratory Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Sanwar Nawaz Khan is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), BCS (Health), MD (Chest Diseases). He is a Consultant, Chest Diseases at Chest Disease Clinic & Hospital, Pabna. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shimla Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Sanwar Nawaz Khan at Shimla Hospital, Pabna is 4pm to 9pm (Sat to Thu) & 9am to 4pm (Friday).

chamber.address: Shimla Tower, Thana Mor, Hospital Road, Pabna
